h2_title: The Duskveil Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Duskveil has a few more ways of forming his sword, and are much harder to see coming. These often happen when he sprays a damaging blood mist in front of him, obscuring him from view -- which means retreating backward can be a wise decision if you want to  it safe.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Duskveil.md', within the main section titled 'The Duskveil', specifically from the subsection 'The Duskveil Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Duskveil has a few more ways of forming his sword, and are much harder to see coming. These often happen when he sprays a damaging blood mist in front of him, obscuring him from view -- which means retreating backward can be a wise decision if you want to  it safe.
